messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Parents of teens
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/15/04 2:22:08 PM, skreams@comcast.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/15/04 2:22:08 PM, skreams@... writes:

<< A homeschooling mom on my local list has some questions about
unschooling, because what they are doing now is making them miserable.
Her son is thirteen, and she would like to talk to some unschoolers
whose kids are teenagers (my kids are 11 and 7, and she feels she needs
to hear from someone whose kids are older). If anyone has time to
answer some questions for her, would you email me for more info? Thanks >>

Can't she just go to www.unschooling.com and read about teens there?

Give her this:

http://sandradodd.com/teens
and the link from the other day, the Canadian girl's site. that was
wonderful!

Sandra

messages.subject: Parents of teens
messages.msgSnippet: A homeschooling mom on my local list has some questions about unschooling, because what they are doing now is making them miserable. Her son is thirteen, and
messages.messageBody:
A homeschooling mom on my local list has some questions about
unschooling, because what they are doing now is making them miserable.
Her son is thirteen, and she would like to talk to some unschoolers
whose kids are teenagers (my kids are 11 and 7, and she feels she needs
to hear from someone whose kids are older). If anyone has time to
answer some questions for her, would you email me for more info? Thanks
~Rue
